attributes.action: Tax Caravans and Trailers that are used on the road
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Because they use space on the road set aside for motor vehicles and contribute to the wear and tear of the highway and also are the cause of considerable delays. I don't think it unfair that anyone who owns and uses either caravans or trailers on the road, shouldn't contribute to Vehicle Revenue as Motorhomes are taxed accordingly.
